name: Top Of The Stairs
lyric:
Well I can climb up
But I can't climb down
Now start get the top of the stairs
But started as the bottom
Turned into the top
And now just a little bit scared
So rescue me mommy
Rescue me daddy
Rescue me nini
Carry this little fella down
I can climb up
But I can't climb down
Now start goin' top of the couch
I'm perched up here
Like a little bitty bird
And now wanna fly back down
Rescue me mommy
Rescue me daddy
Rescue me nini
Help a little guy down
Rescue me mommy
Rescue me daddy
Rescue me nini
Help a little fella down
Skills aren't passed to all at once
Some things take time to learn
I just happen to learn the hard part first
And rescue me mommy
Rescue me daddy
Rescue me nini
Carry this little guy down
